elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Specify the following adjectives by paraphrasing them.

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: Example: conscientious
elements.defaultValue: pünktlich sein, ordentlich und sauber arbeiten, Aufträge fristgerecht ausführen, Termine einhalten.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Team player
elements.correctAnswer: Being able to work together with others, contributing your own ideas, occasionally taking a step back, listening to others.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Flexible
elements.correctAnswer: Being able to interrupt work when something important comes up, being able to work different hours, reacting openly to changes/unforeseen events.

elements.name: question9
elements.title: resilient
elements.correctAnswer: Being physically robust, being able to cope with a heavy workload, being able to withstand mental stress.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Specify the following adjectives by paraphrasing them.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: communicative
elements.correctAnswer: Being able to talk and exchange ideas with other people/customers, being open-minded, being able to sell a project.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: creative
elements.correctAnswer: Having lots of ideas, being artistically talented, having a sense of aesthetics, finding unconventional solutions.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: open
elements.correctAnswer: Sociable and outgoing, enthusiastic, willing to engage with new ideas/projects.

elements.name: question10
elements.title: curious
elements.correctAnswer: Asking questions, wanting to know how things work, reacting openly to new things, wanting to develop further.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Specify the following adjectives by paraphrasing them.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: organized
elements.correctAnswer: Be able to organize your time, plan appointments and processes in such a way that you make the best use of your working time and do the most important things first.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: capable of conflict
elements.correctAnswer: Be able to deal with disputes constructively, address problems, defuse situations.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: motivated
elements.correctAnswer: Show initiative, take on tasks voluntarily, inspire/encourage others, contribute suggestions/your own ideas.

elements.name: question11
elements.title: independent
elements.correctAnswer: Being able to organize yourself, solve problems yourself, know where to go for help.
